00021 #ifndef BOOST_INCLUDED_XINT_DATA_T_H
00022 #define BOOST_INCLUDED_XINT_DATA_T_H
00023 
00024 #if !defined(XINT_SECURE)
00025     #include <vector>
00026 #endif
00027 
00028 namespace boost {
00029 namespace xint {
00030 namespace detail {
00031 
00037 struct data_t {
00045     struct QuickDigits {
00046         static const size_t intbits=std::numeric_limits<unsigned int>::digits;
00047         static const size_t suggested=(2*intbits/bits_per_digit); 
00048         static const size_t minimum=3; 
00049         static const size_t count=(suggested < minimum ? minimum : suggested);
00050     };
00051 
00052     size_t mLength, mAllocated;
00053     digit_t *digits; 
00054     digit_t mQuickDigits[QuickDigits::count];
00055 
00056     #if !defined(XINT_SECURE)
00057         std::vector<digit_t> mStorage;
00058     #endif
00059 
00060     int mCopies;
00061     bool mIsNegative;
00062 
00063     public:
00064     data_t(digit_t initial1=0, digit_t initial2=0, digit_t initial3=0);
00065     data_t(data_t *c);
00066 
00067     #if defined(XINT_SECURE)
00068         ~data_t();
00069     #endif
00070 
00071     void attach() { ++mCopies; }
00072     bool detach() { return (--mCopies==0); }
00073     void alloc(size_t digits, bool copydigits=false);
00074     void realloc(size_t newdigits) { alloc(newdigits, true); }
00075     void skipLeadingZeros();
00076     void copy(const data_t *c, size_t extraDigits=0);
00077     void zero(digit_t *p, size_t count);
00078 
00079     void quickset(digit_t d1, digit_t d2=0, digit_t d3=0);
00080 
00081     void invert();
00082     void negate();
00083 
00084     // These primitives ignore the signs of the parameters, and their results
00085     // are calculated in place.
00086     void add(const data_t& addend);
00087     void subtract(const data_t& subtrahend);
00088 
00089     // These are also calculated in place, for maximum speed.
00090     void shift_left(size_t byBits);
00091     void shift_right(size_t byBits);
00092 };
00093 
00094 } // namespace detail
00095 } // namespace xint
00096 } // namespace boost
